description: Contains Home Health verbal order events information.

columns.name: VERBAL_ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the verbal order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EVENT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Verbal order event type. Types are: submit, received signature, sent to physician, replied with changes. Links to category table ZC_LVO_EVENT_TYPES.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Submit


Received Signature


Sent


Replied With Changes


Printed


Faxed to Provider


Retract


Resent


Received Order


Admin Closed


Reviewed


Electronically Signed


Automatically Canceled


Waiting for Review


Failed Fax


POC Update Sent - No Signature Required

columns.name: EVENT_USER_ID
columns.description: User ID of user who created verbal order event.  Links to table CLARITY_EMP.

columns.name: EVENT_COMMENT
columns.description: Text of the verbal order event comment entered by the user.

columns.name: EVENT_PROVIDER_ID
columns.description: Provider ID for the verbal order event.  Links to table CLARITY_SER.

columns.name: EVENTS_ORDER_HX
columns.description: This item contains the order history for the verbal order.

columns.name: EVENT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the status that this order was changed to when this event occurred.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not Submitted


Submitted


Signed


Sent


Responded


Entered


Resubmitted


Waiting for Review


Retracted


Canceled

columns.name: EVENT_RCV_SIGN_DATE
columns.description: Date on which signature was received from the provider.

columns.name: EVENT_NOTE_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number of the note contact that is associated with the verbal order event.
